channel.title: Complex 317
channel.description:
How do i make the " ancient altar" when u clcik on it pop up a screen of options like to switch to.
instead of having 2 different altars to switch from normal-ancient-lunar
1) i want an altar when u click on it it has all 3 options of normal, ancient, and lunar... i got close to doing it but i just dont get it.
2) what is the interace ###(code) for Items kept on death screen?

item.title: Complex 317
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

  1. If you mean similar to NPC Dialogue, there is a tutorial in the Tutorial section. You could also make it open an interface with options.

Read full topic
